metadata.name: GM // GetInkd #1/99
metadata.description:
GM // GetInkd // Genesis Edition

I’ve wanted to be an “artist” for years, dabbling in many different mediums and styles and I’m excited to finally share a piece that really feels unique and special to me as a creator. As we “GM” everyone at the start of a new day, it only feels fitting to putting myself out to the world for the first time the same way. With a warm and welcoming “GM”. 

The functions of this piece will be multifaceted. First, and foremost, it stands as my genesis collection to my “Get Inkd” Series. This 99-piece edition will serve not only as a commemorative moment to my introduction to the art space, but also as an item that will reward the holders throughout time with additional perks such as early access, free, and discounted drops in the future. 

I hope you enjoy this piece as much as I do, and I’m looking forward to sharing more with you all in the future.

Cheers,  
Chxrli3
